title: Netflix Ad Tier Surpasses 85M Subscribers, Redefining Streaming Monetization
summary: Netflix's ad-supported plan now accounts for 38% of new sign-ups globally. The streamer announces expanded programmatic buying options and first-party audience targeting for advertisers.

title: Programmatic TV Ad Spend Hits Record $32B as CTV Measurement Matures
summary: Connected TV programmatic spending surges as cross-platform measurement solutions from VideoAmp and iSpot gain broad adoption, giving buyers the confidence to shift linear budgets.

title: Disney's Unified Ad Platform Now Serves Hulu, ESPN+, and Disney+ in Single Buy
summary: Disney completes its ad tech unification, letting buyers target and measure campaigns across its entire streaming portfolio through a single programmatic interface with AI-powered audience segmentation.

title: How AI Is Transforming News Publishing Monetization Strategies
summary: Major publishers including The New York Times and Condé Nast deploy AI to dynamically optimize paywall placement, ad density, and subscriber offers, boosting per-reader revenue by up to 28%.

title: YouTube Shorts Monetization Overhaul Gives Creators and Brands New Tools
summary: YouTube revamps Shorts monetization with branded content tags, affiliate link integration, and a new AI-driven ad format that blends seamlessly into the short-form feed experience.

title: Podcast Advertising Grows 28% YoY as Dynamic Insertion Tech Improves
summary: Podcast ad revenue climbs to $4.1B in 2025 as improved dynamic insertion and attribution tools attract performance-focused advertisers alongside traditional brand buyers.

title: Warner Bros. Discovery Bets on Shoppable TV for March Madness Campaign Push
summary: WBD unveils interactive shoppable ad units for its March Madness coverage, letting viewers purchase products directly from live sports broadcasts via QR codes and remote-click integrations.

title: The Trade Desk Unveils Kokai 2.0 With Enhanced AI Bidding for Premium Video
summary: The Trade Desk updates its Kokai platform with next-gen AI bidding algorithms specifically tuned for CTV and premium video environments, promising 15% better cost efficiency for buyers.
